channel.title: Workflow on Jeremy Hemberger
channel.description: Recent content in Workflow on Jeremy Hemberger

item.title: Writing your manuscript in R Markdown
item.description: I really don’t like the Microsoft Office Suite. With the exception of PowerPoint (which I can almost always get to do what I want), the remainder of the suite, especially Word and Excel (NO, THAT COLUMN IS NOT A DATE, and even if it is, DO NOT REFORMAT IT), can be quite frustrating to work with. For the last 6-7 years, I was beholden to doing most of my writing inside the Microsoft environment.
